user_query: I want to create a virtual tour of famous landmarks by gathering webcam information and business details.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of webcams located near the Eiffel Tower.
Fetch a list of webcams located near the Statue of Liberty.
Fetch a list of webcams located near the Taj Mahal.
Fetch a list of webcams located near the Great Wall of China.
Fetch business details and photos of the top 3 tourist attractions near Eiffel Tower.
Fetch business details and photos of the top 3 tourist attractions near Statue of Liberty.
Fetch business details and photos of the top 3 tourist attractions near Taj Mahal.
Fetch business details and photos of the top 3 tourist attractions near Great Wall of China.
